hero.title: HealthyBite AI - your mindful nutrition co-pilot
hero.subtitle: A gentle assistant that helps you structure eating habits without strict diets. Share your routine, get small steps, and keep balance instead of chasing perfection.

messages.user1: I overeat at night, what can I change?
messages.ai1: Let's make evenings calmer: keep a light snack ready at 6 pm, add a 5-minute unwind after work, and put dinner on a plate instead of eating from the pot.
messages.ai2: Try a 2-minute breakfast: yogurt + fruit or toast + eggs. We can scale it up later when mornings feel steadier.

assistant.title: What HealthyBite AI can do for you
assistant.intro: The assistant listens first, then suggests small, realistic adjustments. No forbidden lists - just structure that fits your life.

1.title: Turn vague goals into small steps
1.text: Translate "eat better" into 1-2 doable actions each week.

2.title: Adapt meals to your real schedule
2.text: Plan around late shifts, school runs, or travel days.

3.title: Suggest swaps instead of bans
3.text: Keep your favorites, swap one element at a time.

4.title: Help structure a shopping list
4.text: Group by meals so you know what to buy and why.

5.title: Explain "why", not only calories
5.text: Learn simple reasons behind each suggestion.

plans.title: Smart meal plans without strict diets
plans.subtitle: A flexible framework that follows your day instead of forcing you into a rigid menu.

1.title: Tell AI about your day and preferences
1.text: Timing, hunger cues, foods you like, and what you want to avoid.

2.title: AI suggests a flexible meal framework
2.text: Portions, timing, and anchors that fit your energy curve.

3.title: You tweak portions and foods together
3.text: Swap ingredients, adjust sizes, keep favorites on the plan.

4.title: AI helps adapt after real life happens
4.text: Missed lunch? Busy evening? Get a quick pivot without guilt.

example.subtitle: Gentle structure

breakfast.title: Breakfast
breakfast.text: Greek yogurt with berries, oats, and a handful of nuts.

lunch.title: Lunch
lunch.text: Grain bowl with roasted chicken, greens, avocado, and lemon dressing.

dinner.text: Baked salmon, quinoa, and roasted vegetables. Optional dark chocolate after.

example.footnote: Designed to be adjustable, not perfect.

conversation.title: From chaos to clarity in a few messages
conversation.intro: The chat stays short and practical, guiding you from a messy routine to a plan you can keep.

1.title: You: "I snack randomly all day."
1.text: You share when hunger hits and what snacks you reach for.

2.title: AI asks simple follow-ups
2.text: Schedule, sleep, stress, and where you eat - no long forms.

3.title: AI proposes 1-2 changes for this week
3.text: For example: anchor lunch at 1 pm and add a protein snack at 4 pm.

4.title: You adjust together
4.text: Swap foods, set reminders, and save a "good enough" plan in minutes.

faq.title: AI FAQ & safety
faq.intro: Honest answers about what HealthyBite AI can and cannot do.

items.4: Can I use it if I have a medical condition?
items.5: What if I don't follow the plan perfectly?

answers.1: No. It offers general guidance only and should not replace medical care.
answers.2: It can give structure and ideas, but complex cases still need a professional.
answers.3: We use your inputs to personalize suggestions. Data is handled according to our privacy policy.
answers.4: Only with guidance from your doctor. The AI will not override clinical advice.
answers.5: That is expected. The assistant adapts with you and prefers 'good enough' over strict rules.
answers.6: No. Recommendations focus on balance, satisfaction, and sustainable habits.

cta.text: Talk to HealthyBite AI and co-create a plan that respects your schedule, cravings, and real life.
